text: Jorge Ortiz de Pinedo Pallás (born March 26, 1948) is a Mexican comedian, actor, movie director, screenwriter, television producer and host. He was born in Mexico City. He is known for his telenovela roles in Dos mujeres en mi casa (1984), Dr. Cándido Pérez (1987), Cero en conducta (1999), Humor es... los comediantes (1999), La escuelita VIP (2004), La casa de la risa and Dos hogares (2011). In 2013, Ortiz de Pinedo was diagnosed with lung cancer.
